good: There was a meeting between two young men who met to talk. They sat down in the kitchen to eat dinner. They argued about a woman one man had broken up with and was now dating the other. After the argument they went to the bedroom where there one of the men was hit in the back of the head with a hammer the other had brought with him. He instantly died and laid on the bed. The panicked man wanted to clean the hammer of blood, but he was unsuccessful.
bad: Unfortunately, the clues collected do not allow to find the criminal.
